name: Eat Flies Don't Dies
description:
This was made for Mini Jam 79: Frogs with the limitation of "Only one level."

Froggo is feeling pretty hungry, and the only way to satisfy his appetite is to eat Froggo's favorite food, flies, and a lot of them too. But beware! There are poison bubbles floating everywhere just waiting to hurt poor Froggo.

Controls:

Use the mouse to aim Froggo, and use Space or LMB to use his tongue.

Modes:

For Arcade Mode: The goal is to get points, so you can beat your highscore. Sadly I didn't have much time to playtest, so this mode is ludicrously easy.

For Level One: The goal is to get to Froggo's home, the lily pad while also trying to get as many points as possible.

(P.S. I literally could not think of a better name, oops)
